About Me

I'm Raymond Anthony Belonia. I'm studying Ruby on Rails and Web Development in General. I am still a newbie in all of this though. This self project is one of my firsts that I can call my own.

Random facts about me: I collect playing cards, and of course I know a few card tricks to go with it. I never go out without a music player. I bring a headphone and an IEM wherever I go. I don't like smartphones.
